name: randomgeek
text:
@roytang It depends on the context. List comprehension is my go-to.

One of the little loops was building a list based on unique ID fields, , then counted the number of elements and discarded the little list.

I replaced that with a set comprehension. and used *its* length. For readability, I opted not to just check the length of an inline set comprehension.

Cut execution time down by about half.
